alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:18PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts will impact portions of southwestern Noble and southeastern Garfield Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 517 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of winds from thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Garber to 8 miles north of Lucien to 3 miles south of Red Rock. Movement was southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Enid, Perry, Waukomis, Garber, Covington, Red Rock, Marshall, Breckenridge, Hunter, Fairmont, Douglas, Vance Air Force Base, Lake Mcmurtry, Lucien, North Enid, and Hayward. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 178 and 197. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
